spawn_mob.title: spawn_mob
spawn_mob.description: Spawns the mob at the specified location. You can specify a tag to the mob for later use.

mob.title: mob
mob.description: The mob to spawn. Give a mob ID.

location.title: location
location.description: The location to spawn the mob. This is in x,y,z,yaw,pitch format.

tags.title: tags
tags.description: The list of tags to give the mob, which can be used for other actions

frozen.title: frozen
frozen.description: If frozen, the mob will not idly move or rotate once spawned.

target.title: target
target.description: Causes mobs with the specified tag to target mobs with the specified tag.

selector_tag.title: selector_tag
selector_tag.description: The mobs with the tag that will be targeting.

target_tag.title: target_tag
target_tag.description: The mobs with the tag that will be targeted

range.title: range
range.description: The range of the targeting from the mobs.
